item.title: GE Power India Ltd Hits Intraday Low Amid Price Pressure on 18 Feb 2026
item.description: GE Power India Ltd experienced a significant intraday decline on 18 Feb 2026, touching a low of Rs 496.85, marking a 10.00% drop from its previous close. This sharp fall contrasts with the broader market’s modest downturn, reflecting heightened volatility and immediate selling pressure on the stock within the Heavy Electrical Equipment sector. Time: 18 minutes ago
